title: Karaburun Peninsula
description: Sail into the wild beauty of Karaburun, Albania's only peninsula, where hidden bays like Shën Jani, Shën Vasili, and Shëngjergji reveal untouched waters and dramatic coastal cliffs.

title: Himarë
description: Himarë is a blend of Riviera glamour and authentic Albanian heritage. Its golden beaches, lively promenade, and traditional tavernas make it the beating heart of the southern coast.

title: Filikur
description: Accessible only by yacht, Filikur is one of the Riviera's most secluded coves. Protected by cliffs and lush greenery, it offers crystalline waters and total tranquility.

title: Aquarium Bay
description: Aquarium Bay lives up to its name with crystal-clear waters rich in marine life, making it one of the best snorkeling and diving spots in Albania.

title: Gjipe Beach
description: Gjipe Beach is tucked between towering canyon cliffs, offering soft sands, wild scenery, and deep blue waters — one of Albania's most iconic spots.

title: Dhërmi
description: Dhërmi is famous for its white-pebble beaches, turquoise waters, and vibrant summer atmosphere — a balance of nightlife, luxury, and tradition.

title: Palasë
description: Palasë boasts one of the longest stretches of coastline in Albania, offering dazzling turquoise waters and endless white sands.

title: Bunec
description: Bunec is a small bay south of Himarë, known for its quiet beauty and striking sunsets — perfect for ending the day in tranquility.

title: Krorez
description: Krorez is one of the Riviera's most beautiful beaches, accessible only by sea, with crystal-clear waters and unspoiled nature.

title: Kakome
description: Kakome Bay combines natural charm with sheltered anchorage, framed by untouched hills and calm waters.

title: Ksamil
description: Ksamil is Albania's crown jewel, famous for its sandy islets and turquoise lagoons, often compared to the Caribbean.

title: Tongo Island
description: Tongo Island near Ksamil offers rocky shores, underwater life, and unspoiled surroundings — a castaway-style experience.
